comment: The <ellipse> element is an SVG basic shape, used to create ellipses based on a center coordinate, and both their x and y radius.

attributes.name: cx
attributes.comment:
The x position of the ellipse. 
Value type: <length>|<percentage> ; Default value: 0; Animatable: yes

attributes.name: cy
attributes.comment:
The y position of the ellipse. 
Value type: <length>|<percentage> ; Default value: 0; Animatable: yes

attributes.name: rx
attributes.comment:
The radius of the ellipse on the x axis. 
Value type: auto|<length>|<percentage> ; Default value: auto; Animatable: yes

attributes.name: ry
attributes.comment:
The radius of the ellipse on the y axis. 
Value type: auto|<length>|<percentage> ; Default value: auto; Animatable: yes

attributes.name: pathLength
attributes.comment:
This attribute lets specify the total length for the path, in user units. 
Value type: <number> ; Default value: none; Animatable: yes
